import { Story, Preview, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import { withKnobs, boolean, text } from '@storybook/addon-knobs';
import basicDemo from './demo/basic.twig';

const caption = {
  label: 'Caption',
  defaultValue: 'Mont Blanc appears—still, snowy, and serene.',
  groupId: 'CAPTION'
};

<Meta title="Components/Vendor/Wordpress/Image" decorators={[withKnobs]} />

# Gutenberg Image block (core/image)

The `wp-block-image` class can be used to add theme-specific styling to a Gutenberg image block

<Preview>
  <Story name="Basic">
    {basicDemo({
      isLarge: boolean('Add size-large modifier', false)
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>

## With figcaption

<Preview>
  <Story name="With figcaption">
    {basicDemo({
      isLarge: boolean('Add size-large modifier', false),
      figcaptionContent: text('Caption', 'Mont Blanc appears—still, snowy, and serene.')
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>

## With alt text

<Preview>
  <Story name="With alt text">
    {basicDemo({
      isLarge: boolean('Add size-large modifier', false),
      altText: text('Alt text', 'Mont Blanc')
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>

## Change all values

<Preview>
  <Story name="Change all values">
    {basicDemo({
      isLarge: boolean('Add size-large modifier', false),
      figcaptionContent: text('Caption', 'Mont Blanc appears—still, snowy, and serene.'),
      altText: text('Alt text', 'Mont Blanc'),
      imgUrl: text('Image URL', 'https://s.w.org/images/core/5.3/MtBlanc1.jpg')
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>
